title: Champ Select Trolls
body: Why is it that the trolls that lock in a champ that don't call it don't get disciplined? I'm over calling a lane then some troll just locks in and lane hogs whole game? I have to waste up to 30 mins with someone that is ruining 4 other peoples experience and if I leave I get dodged? This is BS and it needs to be addressed. Sick of these kids coming through and not abiding by the rules!

replies.body: I'm still new so I'm trying to build up my char base before I go into that.
I locked a lane. 2 people locked over me and trolled lane. I got reported.
So trolling is a part of the game? Ruining someone elses game is a part of the game? I can see from this post that you are most likely a culprit?
The BS part is calling lanes, get real.
